name: Meep's Feast
description:
Use W , A , S , D or Arrow keys for movement and eat all the fishes . Please play in windowed mode and not in full screen.

This game was made for BYOG 2020 Game Jam, with "ONE SECOND" as the underlying theme as the path changes every SECOND and you need to help 'Meep' a flightless  bird to  eat all fishes.

Development and Design - Arjun Dev B
Art and UI - Vijetha Nayak
